page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content:
My Dad gets up at six o 'clock and gives the dog his breakfast. Then my mum gets up and gets dressed . Then my Dad goes to work. My Mum shouts for me and my brothers at 1/2 past seven. We have our breakfast and go to school.We have our lunch at school. My Mum and Dad have theirs at home My Dad is a lorry driver, and he has to see where he has to take his load to. At 4 o 'clock when we get home from school we have our tea ,then me and my brothers go and call for our friends . me and my little brother come in at 8 o' clock,my big brother comes in at 10 o'clock.
{Richard Fell (aged 11)
